title: Authorizes Native American nations and tribes to make payments to municipal governments hosting tribal casinos
summary: Authorizes Native American nations and tribes to make payments to municipal governments hosting tribal casinos; such payments shall be in lieu of payments that the state is otherwise required to make to the municipal government.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to authorizing municipal governments hosting tribal casinos to receive payments directly from Native American nations or tribes
